### Welcome to GitHub Pages.resume
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page ![](./images/photo.jpg)content here [using GitHub Flavored Markdown](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/), select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new `gh-pages` branch locally. If you’re using GitHub Desktop, simply sync your repository and you’ll see the new branch.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
